name: Blend Defend
description:
Play as the Towers or as the Units!

There is a font issue. The build we uploaded didn't contain the font file. We use Silver.ttf found here.

The game is entirely controlled by the mouse. Itch's fullscreen mode is recommended.

All instructions are found within the game, good luck! There are 3 levels for each faction.
